about_the_game:
Climb steep cliffs and search for herbs and mushrooms under lush canopies with the Summerwind Saga - Forests & Mountains pack! ELV Games continues their Summerwind Saga series with a variety of trees and rocky cliff faces to add all new areas for your heroes to explore and your farmers to use as new spots to farm! A2 ground tiles are ready to be covered with 29 B sheets filled with grass edges to make smooth transitions, trees and plants to fill an area with nature, and cliffs that can be mixed and matched to create towering mountains.

Each tileset sheet comes in 2 sizes, 32x32px for Ace and 48x48px for MV, so you can use it in your favorite engine! If you’ve been wanting to expand your farming game with some more locations to forage in or need some variations to show different seasons as time passes in your game, check out the Summerwind Saga - Forests & Mountains pack!


Forest Content:

- 4 seasons! (Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter)
- Every tile position match each other tileset
- Multiple type of grounds, trees, wood fences, signs, plants, grass, plus more!

Mountains Content:

- 2 season tilesets (Normal/Winter)
- 2 variation tilesets (4 total tilesets)
- Every tiles position matches the other season tiles
- Treasure chests, ground tiles, stones, mushrooms, plus more!
